Texts.Chs:
^red;危险警告：检测到热浪！^reset;
温度正在拔升，在跑动时你会更容易疲劳，而饥饿感也在侵蚀着你，生命值也正在慢慢降低。
Texts.Eng: ^red;WARNING: HEAT WAVE ^reset;! The climate is spiking in temperature, resulting in extra exertion from movement. You'll be hungry a bit faster, and gradually lose health.

Texts.Chs: 躲到地下？嗯，这真是个好主意，这样就可以降低温度了。
Texts.Eng: Heading underground? Not a bad idea. The effect of the surface heat is substantially reduced down here.

Texts.Chs: 随着太阳的升起，它正在展现出严酷的另一面。请小心，当阳光越来越强烈时，或许会发生一些更糟的事。
Texts.Eng: The sun is rising, bringing another blistering hot day. Take care, and be aware that the brighter it gets, the worse things will become.

Texts.Chs: 如此灼热的阳光，真是太难受了。在下午到来前，酷热将会持续。
Texts.Eng: At it's brightest, the sun here is extremely uncomfortable. Until it gets into the afternoon, expect to suffer a bit more.

Texts.Chs:
^red;危险警告：检测到硫酸风暴！^reset;
在不久后，一场由硫酸主导的风暴将会袭来！如果不想遇到意外，请尽快躲藏起来，除非你有对抗硫酸的护甲。
Texts.Eng: ^red;WARNING! SULPHURIC STORM^reset;! A deadly Sulphuric storm is brewing! Get to shelter as soon as possible unless you have protection against Sulphuric Acid. You will otherwise die rather rapidly.

Texts.Chs:
^red;危险警告：检测到寒潮！^reset;
它异常寒冷，请注意保暖！
Texts.Eng: ^red;WARNING: FREEZING ^reset;! It suddenly got exceptionally cold! Be careful, and keep warm!

Texts.Chs:
^red;危险警告：检测到毒云！^reset;
毒云随着风的流动正在四处扩散，它会逐渐削弱直至将你杀死。请寻找避难所或防护措施。
Texts.Eng: ^red;WARNING: POISONOUS CLOUDS ^reset;! Poisonous clouds are blowing in the wind, which will weaken and eventually kill you. Seek shelter or find some measure of protection.

Texts.Chs:
^red;危险警告：检测到雷电风暴！^reset;
漫天的电流正在伺机将所有挑战它的生物击溃，该风暴会影响你的能量供给，伴随着被雷击所带来的风险，我建议你可以暂时藏于地下。
Texts.Eng: ^red;WARNING: ELECTRICAL STORM ^reset;! A sudden electrical storm has broken out, which will affect your energy supply. There's also the threat of being struck by a blast. Take shelter underground.

Texts.Chs:
^red;危险警告：检测到辐射风暴！^reset;
风与云内都充满了放射性，它们正在聚拢，准备着粗暴地蹂躏这个世界。你应该未雨绸缪。
Texts.Eng: ^red;WARNING: RADIATION STORM ^reset;! Sudden winds have blown in a radiation cloud from somewhere else on this world. Take precautions.

Texts.Chs: ^red;危险警告：检测到寒冷气候！^reset;，这个世界并不是极端的严寒，在这里你可以快乐地玩雪，另外夜间将会更冷，尽量不要下水游玩。请准备好保暖措施。
Texts.Eng: ^red;WARNING: COLD ^reset;! While not absolutely freezing, this world is chilly and brisk. Nights are colder, and water could be dangerous to swim in. Wear cold protection.

Texts.Chs:
^red;危险警告：检测到雷电风暴！^reset;
这附近正在受到雷电风暴的袭击！因为由于大量静电，所以你的能量供应系统将会受到影响。请往地下避难。
Texts.Eng: ^red;WARNING: ELECTRICAL STORM ^reset;! The climate here is currently affected by a nasty Electric Storm! Watch your energy supply, as nearby static charge can affect it negatively. Head underground for shelter!

Texts.Chs: 当处于露天场所，闪电的威力也会随之提升。当你在雷击中时，可以尝试躲藏在地下避过这场灾难。
Texts.Eng: Lightning storms are significantly stronger when you are outside. Perhaps head underground where you are grounded and cannot be struck by lightning.

Texts.Chs: 另外，我必须要提醒你，在风暴过程中，不要游泳。游泳还是得选择阳光明媚的海岸，在这个时候游泳肯定不会给你带来快乐的。
Texts.Eng: I must advise you against swimming in liquid during a lightning storm. The end result is not highly likely to result in fun and merriment.

Texts.Chs:
^red;危险警告：在该星球上检测到沙漠气候！^reset;
沙漠的特征是白天非常暖和，夜晚则会有些冷。在白天，适当地喝水可以浇熄体内的不断攀升的温度，当然，这是建立在你寻找到水源的基础上，另外火系抗性将会大幅提升你的生存几率。
Texts.Eng: ^red;WARNING: DESERT HEAT ^reset;! The climate here is exceptionally warm during the day. Water will help you cool off, if you can find it. Fire Resistance will help a great deal. Night is cool but tolerable.

Texts.Chs: 在这难得一遇的水中泡了一会儿之后，你感到没这么难受了。
Texts.Eng: You've managed to cool off in this wonderful pool of liquid. You feel much less uncomfortable now!

Texts.Chs: 太阳已经西沉，温度正在降至令人难以忍受的程度。你应该在天亮之前，寻找一个适合休息的地点。
Texts.Eng: The sun has set, and the temperature has blissfully dropped to tolerable levels. You should be relatively comfortable until daybreak.

Texts.Chs:
^red;危险警告：在该星球上检测到热带气候！^reset;
这里的气候有些过于温暖，如果不谨慎，或许身体会有所不适，如果你携带水或者寻找到了水源，那么水将可以帮你降至正常温度。另外物理系抗性在这里也能帮助你面临困境。
Texts.Eng: ^red;WARNING: TROPICAL HEAT ^reset;! The climate here is exceptionally warm, which could lead to discomfort if care is not taken. Water will help you cool off, if you can find it. Physical Resistance will help, too.

Texts.Chs: 呼，这应该可以有助于降低你的体温，你可以暂时松口气了。
Texts.Eng: Ah, a soothing spring. This should help lower your temperature and give you a brief moment of respite.

Texts.Chs: 你应小心行事，因为我检测到风裹着放射性尘向着这边吹来。祝你好运！
Texts.Eng: I suggest taking care, as a nasty wind is blowing radioactive fallout right to your position. Good times!

Texts.Chs:
^red;危险警告：在该星球上检测到空气呈毒性！^reset;
我建议你先返回飞船，等您获得了相对应的防护措施再进行探索！毒性空气会让你越来越虚弱，死亡将会随着时间的流逝而接近。
Texts.Eng: ^red;WARNING! POISONOUS ATMOSPHERE DETECTED ^reset;! You're breathing in deadly air that will very soon kill you. You are getting weaker. This will get worse the more sick you become.

Texts.Chs: 起风意味着有毒的气体也正在扩散。星球危险等级正重新估算...危险等级已提升。
Texts.Eng: This breeze is really stirring up poisonous vapour. Threat level increased.

Texts.Chs: 由于洞穴里热度不会扩散，所以相对于外面，这里更为温暖。请保持冷静并待在这儿，或者冲出去送死。
Texts.Eng: You'll find it much warmer in caverns, thanks to heat being trapped within. Stay cool, or you'll stay dead.^reset;!

Texts.Chs:
^red;危险警告：在该星球上检测到射线能量！^reset;
我建议你先返回飞船，等您获得了相对应的防护措施再进行探索！该能量似乎会影响能量恢复速度。
Texts.Eng: ^red;WARNING! COSMIC ENERGY DETECTED ^reset;! Some sort of protection from cosmic damage would help a great deal. This energy appears to decrease energy regeneration rates.

Texts.Chs: 射线能量随着夜幕降临正在越发强大。无论如何，你都应该寻找一个妥善的方法渡过这漫长黑夜。
Texts.Eng: As night falls, the effects of the cosmic energy permeating this planet seem to increase in severity. Somehow, the sun holds the worst of these effects at bay.

Texts.Chs:
^red;危险警告：在该星球上检测到辐射效应！^reset;
我建议你先返回飞船，等您获得了相对应的防护措施再进行探索！
Texts.Eng:
^red;WARNING! RADIATION DETECTED ^reset;! 
You should not attempt further exploration without proper protective equipment!

Texts.Chs:
^red;危险警告：在该星球上检测到寒冷气候！^reset;
我建议你先返回飞船，等您获得了相对应的防护措施再进行探索！
Texts.Eng:
^red;WARNING! EXTREME COLD DETECTED ^reset;! 
You should not attempt further exploration without proper protective equipment!

Texts.Chs:
^red;危险警告：在该星球上检测到炎热气候！^reset;
我建议你先返回飞船，等您获得了相对应的防护措施再进行探索！
Texts.Eng:
^red;WARNING! EXTREME HEAT DETECTED ^reset;! 
You should not attempt further exploration without proper protective equipment!

Texts.Chs: 该星球没有氧气，如果强行停留，你将有可能窒息而亡！
Texts.Eng: It may be worth noting that this celestial body has no atmosphere and you will die without some sort of oxygen source.

Texts.Chs:
^red;危险警告：在该星球上检测到致命辐射效应！^reset;
我建议你先返回飞船，等您获得了相对应的防护措施再进行探索！
Texts.Eng:
^red;WARNING! RADIATION DETECTED ^reset;! 
You should not attempt further exploration without proper protective equipment!

Texts.Chs:
^red;危险警告：在该星球上检测到致命严寒气候！^reset;
我建议你先返回飞船，等您获得了相对应的防护措施再进行探索！
Texts.Eng:
^red;WARNING! EXTREME COLD DETECTED ^reset;! 
You should not attempt further exploration without proper protective equipment!

Texts.Chs:
^red;危险警告：在该星球上检测到致命高温气候！^reset;
我建议你先返回飞船，等您获得了相对应的防护措施再进行探索！
Texts.Eng:
^red;WARNING! EXTREME HEAT DETECTED ^reset;! 
You should not attempt further exploration without proper protective equipment!

Texts.Chs:
^red;危险警告：在该星球上检测到原液效应！^reset;
我建议你先返回飞船，等您获得了相对应的防护措施再进行探索！
Texts.Eng:
^red;WARNING! PROTO-POISON DETECTED ^reset;! 
You should not attempt further exploration without proper protective equipment!

Texts.Chs:
^red;危险警告：在该星球上检测到硫酸效应！^reset;
我建议你先返回飞船，等您获得了相对应的防护措施再进行探索！
Texts.Eng:
^red;WARNING! SULPHURIC ATMOSPHERE DETECTED ^reset;! 
You should not attempt further exploration without proper protective equipment!
